# Absorb Rune III (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 9]], [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 18th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 18]], [[BoXM 18th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 18]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a white silk glove worth 25 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One spell effect

**Duration:** Instantaneous plus 1 minute/level (see text)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Adventurer's Guide, pg. 61

This spell functions like *[[Absorb Rune I (Spell)|absorb rune I]]*, but it can affect runes equivalent to a spell of 8th level or lower.
